name: Moonlight Stalker Master
prerequisiteFormula: (@int_score >= 13 OR @feat:blind_fight OR @feat:combat_expertise OR @feat:improved_feint OR @feat:moonlight_stalker OR @feat:moonlight_stalker_feint OR @skill:bluff >= 9 OR @spell:darkvision OR @rage_power:low_light_vision)
descriptionText: You leave your opponents swinging at shadows while you slide elusively through the darkness.
